title: Blog Post Intro
header: Introducing your blog post with a summary statement.
description: It is used to introduce the topic of the blog post and to provide a brief overview of what the reader can expect to learn by reading the blog post.
helpHint: what you want your readers to take away or any background to the blog you're writing, we'll create a blog post intro based on that.

title: Blog Post Conclusion
header: Write compelling blog post conclusions that keep readers engaged.
description: A blog post conclusion wraps up the main points of the blog post and provides a brief summary of what the reader has learned.
helpHint: Write a few paragraphs of your blog and then we'll create a conclusion of the blog post based on that.

title: Blog Post AIDA
header: Create a blog post with three sections: attention, desire, action.
description: It can be used to help you create a persuasive and attention-grabbing blog post by outlining the key points that you want to cover in your post.
helpHint: Write about your product or an idea; then we will use AIDA: Attention, Interest, Desire, Action for it.

title: Blog Post Headline
header: The tool to create attention grabbing headlines for your blog posts.
description: A blog post headline can help you to come up with a catchy headline for your blog post.
helpHint: Write a few paragraphs of your blog here, and we'll give you a title for your blog post.

title: Blog Post Summary
header: Generate a short summary of a longer blog post with a click of a button.
description: It can be used to summarize the blog post and provide a concise description.
helpHint: Write a few paragraphs about your blog here or any other idea; then we'll create a summary blog post for it.

title: Paraphrase
header: Create your own content by simply changing words and phrases in the existing content.
description: It can be used to rewrite a text to improve its readability and to ensure that the meaning of the text is retained.
helpHint: Write about your product or an idea; then we will paraphrase it for you.

title: Mission Statement
header: A concise statement that expresses your company's purpose and values.
description: A mission statement is a declaration of the purpose of a company or organization. It is a statement of the organization's core values and beliefs, and its overall goal or purpose.
helpHint: Write a few paragraphs about your business or product; then we'll create a mission statement for it.

title: Vision Statement
header: Create a powerful statement that inspires your team and customers.
description: A vision statement is a declaration of the company's purpose or a declaration of what the company hopes to achieve in the future.
helpHint: Write a few paragraphs about your business or product; then we'll create a vision statement for it.

title: Value Proposition
header: Craft your value proposition statement that resonates with customers and drives sales.
description: A value proposition is a statement that summarizes the benefit that a customer will receive by using a particular product or service.
helpHint: Write a few paragraphs about your business or product; then we'll create a value proposition for it.

title: Rewrite - Adjust Tone
header: Rephrase content to match a specific tone, for example, friendly or persuasive.
description: It can be used to adjust the tone of a document to make it more persuasive or to match the tone of the company's branding.
helpHint: Write a few paragraphs about your company or product, then we'll write about it in a different tone and voice.

title: Friendly Email
header: Write sales emails that are as friendly as it is convincing.
description: It can be used to draft a professional and friendly email to a colleague or client.
helpHint: Write the main point you want to address in this email, and then we'll create a friendly email based on it.

title: Follow-up Email
header: Write an email that prompts a customer to buy your product.
description: A followup email can be used to remind a customer about a product they were interested in or to provide additional information about a product they have already purchased.
helpHint: Write the main point you want to raise in this email, and then we'll wrap it up with a follow-up template in the best possible way.

title: Cold Email
header: Generate emails for cold outreach to get your business in front of the right people.
description: A cold email is a message that is sent to a potential customer who has not been previously contacted by the sender. It is used to introduce a product or service and to request a meeting or an opportunity to discuss the product or service further.
helpHint: Write a few paragraphs about your business or product; then we'll wrap it up with a cold template in the best possible way.

title: Thanks You Email
header: Write email to thank customers after they purchase your products.
description: Acknowledging and thanking someone for their help or support can be a great way to show your appreciation and to strengthen the relationship.
helpHint: Write a few paragraphs about your business or product; then we'll wrap it up with a thanks you template in the best possible way.

title: Grammar
header: Check the grammar of your text and make it more appealing.
description: AI-powered grammar tools can help to improve the grammar and punctuation of your writing.
helpHint: Write a few paragraphs; then we improve the grammar of the given text.

title: Meta Descriptions
header: Write descriptions of your website that compel search engines to rank your website.
description: It can be used to create meta descriptions, which are short summaries of the page that appear in search engine results.
helpHint: Write a few paragraphs; then we'll create a meta description for the given text.

title: Product Description
header: Create a unique description that markets the value of your product.
description: It can be used to create a well-written and informative product description for Amazon.
helpHint: Write a few paragraphs; then we'll create a Product Description for the given text.

title: Expand Outline
header: Generate ideas by expanding a key point.
description: It can be used to expand the ideas presented in an outline to help you write a more detailed and comprehensive document.
helpHint: Write a few paragraphs; then we'll expand the given text.

title: Keyword Finder
header: Identify the right keywords for your business.
description: It helps you find the best target keywords for your content and how optimized your content can be for search engines with different keywords.
helpHint: Write a few paragraphs; then we'll find the best keywords for the given text that is optimized for search engines and your content that conveys that.

title: Question Generator
header: Create prospecting questions that make your prospects want to buy.
description: It can be used to generate a question from a paragraph or for a particular topic.
helpHint: Write a few paragraphs; then we'll generate a question for the given text.

title: Sub Headers
header: Create persuasive sub headers that entice people to read your content.
description: It is useful to create an additional heading or title immediately after the main heading or title of a text block.
helpHint: Write a few paragraphs; then we'll create a sub header for the given text.

title: Landing Page Headline Description
header: A recipe for creating a compelling and engaging headline for a homepage.
description: It can be used to create a short and catchy description that invites users to learn more about the product or service.
helpHint: Write a few paragraphs; then we'll create a Landing Page Headline Description for the given text.

title: Landing Page Headline Description
header: Piece together a compelling headline description that creates a call to action on your landing page.
description: It can be used to create a short and catchy description that invites users to learn more about the product or service.
helpHint: Write a few paragraphs; then we'll create a Landing Page Headline Description for the given text.

title: Blog Post PAS
header: Generate unique posts using the best formats and the best words.
description: Pain, Agitate, Solve. Or Problem, Agitate, Solution. If you want to write a good copy, you should think about the problem that your reader is experiencing, and then agitate that problem. Finally, offer a solution that will make the reader's life better.
helpHint: Write a few paragraphs and then we will create a problem, an agitation and a solution for the given text.

title: Google Ad Description
header: Write compelling ads that generate clicks.
description: It can be used to create a short and catchy description that invites users to learn more about the product or service.
helpHint: Write a few paragraphs; then we'll create a Google Ad Description for the given text.

title: Google Ad Headline
header: Generate ad titles that get your ads noticed.
description: Google Ad Headlines are used to create a catchy headline for your Google Ad.
helpHint: Write a few paragraphs; then we'll create a Google Ad Headline for the given text.
